001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.pairing;
002
003import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.errors.PairingException;
004import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.WalletMessage;
005import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.WalletMessageType;
006
007public class PairingMessage implements WalletMessage {
008
009    static WalletMessageType TYPE = WalletMessageType.PAIRING_EVENT;
010
011    String rawMessage;
012
013    private WalletPairingEventMessage pairingEvent;
014
015    @Override
016    public WalletMessageType getType() {
017        return TYPE;
018    }
019
020    @Override
021    public String getRawMessage() {
022        return rawMessage;
023    }
024
025    @Override
026    public void setRawMessage(String rawMessage) {
027        this.rawMessage = rawMessage;
028    }
029
030    WalletPairingEventType getWalletPairingEvent() {
031        return pairingEvent.event;
032    }
033
034    public boolean isSuccess(){
035        return pairingEvent.success;
036    }
037
038    public PairingException getError(){
039        return pairingEvent.errorCode == null ? null : new PairingException(pairingEvent.errorCode);
040    }
041
042}
